sourcesContent:
<template>
  <main @onModalActivated="toggleModal" @onModalDeactivated="toggleModal" id="content__wrapper" :class="`${isBlurModeState ? 'blur' : ''}`">
      <slot />
      <v-overlay z-index="1000" :value="overlay" color="black">

      </v-overlay>
  </main>
</template>

<script>
export default {
  name: "content",
  data: () => ({
    overlay: false,
    isBlurModeState: false
  }),
  props: {
    pageName: {
      type: String,
      required: true
    },
  },
  mounted() {
    this.$root.$on("onContentBlurToggle", () => {
      this.isBlurModeState = !this.isBlurModeState;
    })
  },
  methods: {
    toggleModal() {
      console.log("zcxcczczcz");
      this.overlay = !this.overlay;
    }
  }
}
</script>
